programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Luca's Key Ingredient S2
programme.desc: An exciting seven-part cooking show where Italian born Chef Luca Ciano will take your taste buds on a journey showcasing some exceptional Italian and Australian produce. He will share some insights on some key ingredient history and plate up meals that will leave you feeling true Italian love on a plate. Luca's lovable personality connects his joy of cooking with his remarkable journey over the years.

programme.desc: When Dom and Sparky discover that Sparky has baked an enormous teddy treat, they go out of their way to please her in the hopes of getting it. Later, Tizzy sets up her very own House of Fashion and gives all her friends brand new looks. However, her makeover ideas don't quite work out as planned.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: It's been raining all day and Hiccup and Sneeze are stuck indoors with nothing to do. Bibi comes up with a series of games and activities to keep them entertained, but things don't quite work out as planned.

programme.desc: Follow small, grasshopper-sized boy named Gus who wishes to become the greatest knight in all the kingdom of Karamel! Armed with his laser sword and mounted on his electric pony, Gus will never miss an opportunity to pursue adventure and win the day.

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: Mindy is impatient for winter, so she can ice skate. She asks Jet to make it winter. Jet, Sean, and Sydney get Celery to fly them out to gather ice from Saturn's icy rings, so they can create a personal-sized winter in Jet's back yard. They return to see that Sunspot has built a freeze-ray and helped Mindy make a mini-skating rink out of the sandbox, which is a good start, but kind of small.

They try to track the lead suspect Vaughn who seems to have electrical malfunctions following him all day. But Jake not being able to control his powers could put the team in great danger as they try to find the villain who is absorbing all the electricity. And when Jake gets into a electrical battle with the villain, things get out of hand.

programme.desc: Travel to the far corners of the planet and discover the secrets of Earth's few remaining untouched lands, all brimming withlife. In these lands, life exists as nature intended.

programme.title: 健康密码 第四季
programme.desc: 骨关节炎被世界卫生组织称为“不死的癌症”。在亚洲地区，平均每6个人中就有1人会患上不同程度的骨关节炎。现代人不良的生活习惯、体形变化差异与职场超时工作的伤害，令骨骼肌肉系统的损伤日益普遍。本集健康密码医疗组包括马大医院骨关节运动创伤外科医生张晓慧医生、擅长人体结构推拿的林千（马丰）中医师，解码日常生活习惯如何导致骨关节炎提早发生，如長時間低頭玩手機、側頭聽電話、沙發馬鈴薯、雙腿交疊成二郎腿等等，乍看或許無傷大雅，但長久下來卻造成肌肉緊繃與身體僵化，影響筋膜、肌肉、與骨骼的正確位置，甚至骨盆、脊椎的歪斜或錯.
